name: King's Conquest (teamkalamakkara)
description:
The game might show a black screen in the beginning for several seconds while it's loading.

King's Conquest is a chess roguelike game, where you advance through several randomly generated floors until you reach floor 12 where you must defeat the enemy king. The game was made during 7 Day Roguelike Challenge 2023.

How to play:

  • Click on a blue unit and then click on a valid square to move it there. You can also drag a unit and drop it where you want it to go. Move on top of enemy units to capture them.
  • Move any of your units to the staircase to go to the next level.
  • Between levels you can spend material to buy new units and sell units. You gain material by capturing enemy units. Gained material is limited to 6 per unit.
  • Level 12 contains the enemy king. Capture it to win the game.

The game was made using Rust and macroquad. Source code is available at Github.
